Package index

Shiny applications

Interactive applications to use and demonstrate tools in the package.

run_ConSciR_app()
Run ConSciR Shiny Application (TRH, Psychrometric, Bivariate charts)
run_Mould_app()
Run ConSciR Mould Application
run_SilicaGel_app()
Run ConSciR Silica Gel Calculator Application
run_TidyData_app()
Run ConSciR Tidying Data Application

Tools for the analysis of conservation data

Tidying, adding variables, summaries and graphing.

graph_TRH()
Graph temperature and humidity data
graph_psychrometric()
Create a Psychrometric Chart
graph_TRHbivariate()
Graph a bivariate plot of temperature and humidity data
add_conservation_calcs()
Add Conservation calculations to temperature and humidity data
add_humidity_calcs()
Add Humidity calculations to temperature and humidity data
add_humidity_adjustments()
Adjust Humidity with temperature and/or absolute humidity, RH zones and Energy costs
add_time_vars()
Add Time Variables to a dataframe
tidy_TRHdata()
Tidy and Process Temperature and Relative Humidity data
tidy_Meaco()
Tidy Meaco sensor data
tidy_Hanwell()
Tidy Hanwell EMS Data

Conservation tools

Tools for the analysis of data for conservators.

calcMould_Zeng()
Calculate Mould Growth Rate Limits (Zeng et al.)
calcMould_VTT()
Calculate Mould Growth Index (VTT model)
calcPI()
Calculate Preservation Index
calcLM()
Calculate Life-time Multiplier for chemical degradation
calcEMC_wood()
Calculate Equilibrium Moisture Content for wood (EMC)

Humidity functions

Functions for performing calculations from temperature and humidity data.

calcFtoC()
Convert temperature (F) to temperature (C)
calcAH()
Calculate Absolute Humidity
calcDP()
Calculate Dew Point
calcFP()
Calculate Frost Point
calcAD()
Calculate Air Density
calcSH()
Calculate Specific Humidity
calcMR()
Calculate Mixing Ratio
calcHR()
Calculate Humidity Ratio
calcPw()
Calculate Water Vapour Pressure
calcPws()
Calculate Water Vapour Saturation Pressure
calcEnthalpy()
Calculate Enthalpy
calcRH_AH()
Calculate Relative Humidity from temperature and absolute humidity
calcRH_DP()
Calculate Relative Humidity from temperature and dew point
calcTemp()
Calculate Temperature from relative humidity and dew point

Sustainability

Tools for calculating energy consumption related to environmental management.

calcCoolingPower()
Calculate Cooling Power
calcCoolingCapacity()
Calculate Cooling Capacity
calcSensibleHeating()
Calculate Sensible Heating
calcTotalHeating()
Calculate Total Heating
calcSensibleHeatRatio()
Calculate Sensible Heat Ratio (SHR)

Data

In-built datasets and data helper functions.

mydata
Climate dataset to demonstrate functions
TRHdata
Climate dataset to demonstrate functions
data_file_path()
Return the file path to data files
shiny_dataUploadServer()
Shiny Module Server for Data Upload and Processing
shiny_dataUploadUI()
Shiny Module UI for Data Upload and Processing
